Description: Solid-cast copper alloy figure of a bull-headed deity wearing a wig and a shendyt kilt; two tangs beneath the feet.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Gen Sir John Grenfell Maxwell
Curator's comments: Bulls: Image and Cult in the Ancient Mediterranean, Barcelona, 2003, pp. 258, 313 [16] = The Bull in the Mediterranean World, Athens 2003, p. 157 [16] [In both versions wrongly identified as 'EA 59839'].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: Exhibition: "The Bull in the Ancient World", Barcelona, 14 Nov 2002-13 Feb 2003.
